name: We Have a Pope
tagline: A story centered on the relationship between the newly elected Pope and his therapist.

name: Little Ashes
tagline: About the young life and loves of artist Salvador Dalí, filmmaker Luis Buñuel and writer Federico García Lorca.

name: DOA: Dead or Alive
tagline: The movie adaptation of the best selling video game series Dead or Alive.

name: Attack of the 50 Foot Woman
tagline: When an abused socialite grows to giant size because of an alien encounter and an aborted murder attempt, she goes after her cheating husband with revenge on her mind.

name: Kismat Konnection
tagline: A luckless architect discovers a social activist to be his lucky charm. Unfortunately, she's protecting the community center he's aiming to win a contract to tear down.

name: Crossing the Bridge
tagline: The adventures of three teenage friends in 1970s Detroit.

name: Just Another Girl on the I.R.T.
The Second Jungle Book: Mowgli & Baloo
Nine Lives
tagline: Captives of the very relationships that define and sustain them, nine women resiliently meet the travails and disappointments of life.

name: Joshua
tagline: The arrival of a newborn girl causes the gradual disintegration of the Cairn family; particularly for 9-year-old Joshua (Kogan), an eccentric boy whose proper upbringing and refined tastes both take a sinister turn.

name: The Baader Meinhof Complex
tagline: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

name: Casa de los babys
castlist: El Flaco de Oro de Acapulco
tagline: Six American women who planned on travelling to South America to adopt babies are forced, by law, to live there.

name: Beer League
tagline: An unemployed slacker (Lange) inspires his softball teammates to improve their game so they won't get kicked out of the local league.

name: The White Balloon
tagline: Several people try to take advantage of a little girl's innocence to hustle money her mom gave to her to buy a goldfish with.

name: Aaja Nachle
tagline: A New York dance instructor returns to her home village in India after 11 years to find that the arts centre where she learned her craft is to be demolished and replaced with a shopping mall.

name: Fast Food
tagline: What would happen if a sex drug ended up in the Secret Sauce of a new burger joint?

name: The Run of the Country
tagline: In a small village on the border of Northern Ireland and The Republic of Ireland, the relationship between a short tempered policeman and his rebellious son becomes even more strenuous when the young man falls for a "wrong" girl.

name: Phantom
tagline: The haunted Captain of a Soviet submarine holds the fate of the world in his hands. Forced to leave his family behind, he is charged with leading a covert mission cloaked in mystery.

name: Weekend
tagline: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.

name: Fool for Love
tagline: May is waiting for her boyfriend in a run-down American motel, when an old flame turns up and threatens to undermine her efforts and drag her back into the life that she was running away from. The situation soon turns complicated.

name: The Flat
tagline: As a documentarian cleans out the flat that belonged to his grandparents - both immigrants from Nazi Germany - he uncovers clues pointing to a complicated and shocking story.

name: Submarine
tagline: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.

name: Apprentice to Murder
tagline: Fire-and-brimstone preacher sees Satan everywhere, trains gullible young boy to "detect" evil, and the two of them commit several murders in the name of Jesus. Based on a true story.

name: Kissed
tagline: Over the years, a child's romantic ideals about death blossom into necrophilia, the study of embalming and the most profound relationship of her life.

name: Dream with the Fishes
tagline: Terry is a suicidal voyeur who treats a dying addict to a final binge, but Terry will only do this if he promises to kill him.

name: Blue Car
tagline: A troubled young woman is encouraged by a teacher to enter a poetry contest.

name: The Last Shot

production.name: Morra, Brezner, Steinberg and Tenenbaum Entertainment (MBST)

tagline: A movie director-screenwriter finds a man to finance his latest project but soon discovers that the producer is actually an undercover FBI agent working on a mob sting operation.

name: Romeo & Juliet: Sealed with a Kiss
Thank You
tagline: Three wives engage the services of a private investigator after they suspect their respective husbands of infidelity.

name: Walk Like a Man
tagline: Boy raised by wolves is reunited as an adult with his real family.

name: Jodorowsky's Dune
tagline: The story of cult film director Alejandro Jodorowsky's ambitious but ultimately doomed film adaptation of the seminal science fiction novel.

name: Flight of the Red Balloon
tagline: A little boy and his baby-sitter inhabit the same imaginary world: through their adventures they are followed by a strange red balloon.

name: The Shrimp on the Barbie
tagline: Down on his luck and working in a Mexican restaurant in Australia, an American tourist is hired by a icy heiress to pose as an obnoxious new boyfriend in an attempt to make her father accept her current boyfriend.

name: The Myth of Fingerprints
tagline: An ambitious debut for writer/director Bart Freundlich charting the unrest with a family who gather together for thanks giving.

name: The Vertical Ray of the Sun
Pearl Jam Twenty
tagline: A documentary on the band Pearl Jam that marks their 20th anniversary in the year 2011.

name: Last Days
tagline: A Seattle-set rock & roll drama about a musician whose life and career is reminiscent of Kurt Cobain's.

name: The Legend of Suriyothai
tagline: During the 16th century, as Thailand contends with both a civil war and Burmese invasion, a beautiful princess rises up to help protect the glory of the Kingdom of Ayothaya. Based on the life of Queen Suriyothai.

name: Rain
tagline: Whilst on a family vacation on the Mahurangi Peninsula in New Zealand, 13-year-old Janey begins to realize that her parents' marriage is on the rocks.

name: The Most Dangerous Man in America: Daniel Ellsberg and the Pentagon Papers
The Extra Man
tagline: A man who escorts wealthy widows in New York's Upper East Side takes a young aspiring playwright under his wing.

name: Day Watch
tagline: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

name: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
Side Out
tagline: A law student comes to California for the summer and ends up playing professional volleyball.

name: The Wonderful, Horrible Life of Leni Riefenstahl
tagline: A documentary about the life and work of Leni Riefenstahl, a German film director most notorious for making the most effective propaganda films for the Nazis.

name: The Damned United
tagline: A look at Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of Leeds United.

name: Lockdown
tagline: Avery (Jones) returns to college as a competitive swimmer after getting his life back on track. But his life takes another unexpected turn when he and his two friends (Bonds, Casseus) are wrongly accused of murder and end up in prison.

name: Time Out
tagline: An unemployed man finds his life sinking more and more into trouble as he hides his situation from his family and friends.

name: Brother
tagline: A Japanese gangster is exiled to Los Angeles where his brother lives with a small but respectable multi-racial gang, who he inspires to expand their influence.

name: The Decalogue
tagline: Ten television drama films, each one based on one of the Ten Commandments.

name: The Triumph of Love
tagline: A princess is determined to restore her homeland's throne to its rightful heir, a young prince with whom she falls in love.

name: Callas Forever
tagline: A fictionalized account of the last days of opera singer Maria Callas (Ardant).

name: I Am Trying to Break Your Heart
tagline: First-time filmmaker and award-winning photographer Sam Jones documents the recording of Wilco's album, "Yankee Hotel Foxtrot."

name: The Whoopee Boys
tagline: Two obnoxious and dim-witted misfits attempt to save a school for needy children by attempting to sneak into the wealthy high society of Palm Beach to get the money needed for their cause.

name: The Heart of the Game
tagline: A documentary Roosevelt Roughriders, a girls' high-school basketball team in Seattle, and one player's fight to regain her eligibility to play.

name: The Rainbow
tagline: A young woman deals in her own personal way with the trials of adolescence and young adulthood in early 1900s England.

name: The Last Supper
tagline: A group of idealistic, but frustrated, liberals succumb to the temptation of murdering rightwing pundits for their political beliefs.

name: The Beautiful Country
tagline: After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live.

name: Kurt & Courtney
tagline: A documentary on the life of Kurt Cobain and his relationship with Courtney Love.

name: On the Edge
tagline: In one final attempt to achieve victory, an aging professional runner is training vigorously for a very tough marathon race.

name: When the Road Bends: Tales of a Gypsy Caravan
tagline: A brief look into Romani culture and Rom (Gypsies) from around the globe as five famous Romani groups tour the USA. The film visits their families at home in Spain, India, Macedonia and Romania.

name: Kids in America
tagline: A diverse group of high school students band together to peacefully stick it to their overbearing principal.
